top.title: US discussing options to acquire Greenland, including use of military, says White House
top.summary: It came as European allies rallied behind Denmark, which is pushing back against Trump's ambitions for the Arctic island.

top.title: Russia sends navy to guard oil tanker being pursued by US forces
top.summary: US officials say that American forces plan to seize the Russian-flagged ship, which is accused of breaking sanctions.

top.title: Families shocked Swiss ski bar was not inspected for years before deadly fire
top.summary: The New Year's Eve fire at a bar in Crans-Montana killed 40 people and injured 116.

top.title: Government demands Musk's X deals with 'appalling' Grok AI deepfakes
top.summary: Grok is being used to digitally remove women's clothing - something victims describe as "dehumanising".

top.title: Lego unveils tech-filled Smart Bricks - to play experts' unease
top.summary: Lego says its new tech-enabled products are its "most revolutionary innovation" since it launched its mini-figurines in 1978.

top.title: Nvidia unveils self-driving car tech as it seeks to power more products with AI
top.summary: The chip giant is looking for ways to move the AI revolution beyond software and into physical products.

title.#text: The weirdest tech we’ve seen at CES 2026
Logitech caused its mice to freak out by not renewing a certificate
I played with the Lego Smart Brick
